statements: UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET likes_count = likes_count + 10, comments_count = comments_count + 5 WHERE post_id = 101;
UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET shares_count = 20, likes_count = likes_count + 15 WHERE post_id = 102;
UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET likes_count = likes_count + 10, comments_count = comments_count - 5 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET shares_count = shares_count + 15, post_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE post_id = 2;
UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET likes = 150, shares = 75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE digital_marketing_campaigns SET budget = 5000.00, end_date = '2023-01-31' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET likes = 100, comments = 50 WHERE post_id = 123 AND user_id = 456;
UPDATE digital_marketing_campaigns SET budget = 2500.00, end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_name = 'Holiday Sale';
UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET engagement_score = 8.7, likes_count = 50 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE campaigns SET total_budget = 5000.00, start_date = '2022-06-01' WHERE campaign_id = 100;
UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET engagement_score = 8.9, comments_count = 20 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE campaigns SET total_budget = 15000.00, start_date = '2022-06-01' WHERE campaign_id = 54321;
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET likes=100, shares=50 WHERE post_id=1;
UPDATE user_demographics SET age=30, location='New York' WHERE user_id=4;
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET likes = 100, shares = 50 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE user_demographics SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE users SET email = 'new_email@example.com', join_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET post_text = 'Updated post content.' WHERE post_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', username='newusername' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE posts SET post_text='Updated post text' WHERE user_id=2 AND post_date='2022-01-01';
